basics.summary: Currently employed at Red Brick University. Short biography for the left-hand sidebar

courses: Focused on ML, Computational Neuroscience and ethics of AI
Started the two Study Projects "AI for Science" and "Emergent Behaviour in Multi-Agent-Systems"
Part of the master application selection committee from 2023 to 2025
Master thesis: Emergence of language in situated environments (Grade: 1.0)

Bachelor thesis "Conception and implementation of a simulation environment for analyzing the spread of Sars-CoV-2 at events events with machine learning agents" graded with the best possible grade of 1.0
